Text: Pleeease seed! Stephen, if you're checking out how you're book is doing on TPB, and I KNOW you come here you old Queen, please seed! Give your poor fans a break you hypocrite! Keep up the good work! *bisous*
I'm about half way through and I really want to smack him in the face.
Who's reading it? Is it Stephen? Oh please tell me it's Stephen, I beg of you.
It is indeed read by Stephen Fry. 2 mp3s each about 6hrs long.
